os.description: Identifier of the system, depending on the provider. In case of * openstack - image name, * beaker - distro name, * openshift - container image name, * any other name specific to the provider.

provider.description: System used for provisioning. This can also be hostname of the specific system instance.

architecture.description: Architecture of the system/distro used for testing.

variant.description: The compose or image variant, if applicable.
